    • getSystemConfig

      public ReActorSystemConfig getSystemConfig()

      The configuration for the reactor system

    • getSystemSink

      public ReActorRef getSystemSink()
      Returns:
      A reference to a reactor that swallows every message it receives

    • getSystemDeadLetters

      public ReActorRef getSystemDeadLetters()
      Returns:
      A reference to the system deadletters

    • getUserReActorsRoot

      public ReActorRef getUserReActorsRoot()
      Returns:
      A reference to the root of all the reactors created by a user

    • getSystemRemotingRoot

      public ReActorRef getSystemRemotingRoot()
      Returns:
      A reference to the root of all the system reactors. A system reactor is a reactor that has some use within the reactor system itself

    • getMsgFanOutPool

      public java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getMsgFanOutPool()
      Returns:
      The Typed Sniff Subscription fan out pool

      Returns:

    • registerReActorSystemDriver

      public Try<java.lang.Void> registerReActorSystemDriver​(ReActorSystemDriver anyDriver)
      Register a new driver within the reactor system.
      Parameters:
      anyDriver - A ReActed driver
      Returns:
      A successfull Try on success, a failed one containing the exception that caused the error otherwise

    • unregisterReActorSystemDriver

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<java.lang.Void>> unregisterReActorSystemDriver​(ReActorSystemDriver anyDriver)
      Unregister from the system a driver
      Parameters:
      anyDriver - The driver instance we want to unregister
      Returns:
      A future that will contain once completed the outcome of the operation

    • findGate

      public java.util.Optional<ReActorSystemRef> findGate​(ReActorSystemId reActorSystemId, ChannelId decodingDriverChannelId)

    • initReActorSystem

      public ReActorSystem initReActorSystem()
      Activate the reactorsystem. Before this call, the reactorsystem is not operational and does not require an explicit shutdown
      Returns:
      An inited ReActorSystem

    • shutDown

      public void shutDown()
      Shutdown the reactorsystem. All the reactors will be halted through a stop() according to the stop() hierarchical semantic

    • serviceDiscovery

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<ServiceDiscoveryReply>> serviceDiscovery​(java.lang.String serviceName, ServiceDiscoveryRequest.SelectionType selectionType)
      Request a reactor reference for the specified service.
      Parameters:
      serviceName - Service name
      selectionType - Type or reference required
      Returns:
      On success a future containing the result of the request On failure a future containing the exception that caused the failure

    • serviceDiscovery

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> serviceDiscovery​(java.lang.String serviceName, ServiceDiscoveryRequest.SelectionType selectionType, ReActorRef requester)
      Request a reactor reference for the specified service
      Parameters:
      serviceName - Service name
      selectionType - Type or reference required
      requester - source of this request
      Returns:
      The outcome of the request

    • spawn

      public Try<ReActorRef> spawn​(ReActor reActor)
      Create a new reactor
      Parameters:
      reActor - a generic reactor
      Returns:
      A successful Try containing the ReActorRef for the new reactor on success, a failed Try on failure

    • spawn

      public Try<ReActorRef> spawn​(ReActions reActions, ReActiveEntityConfig<?,​?> reActorConfig)
      Create a new reactor
      Parameters:
      reActions - reactor behavior
      reActorConfig - reactor configuration
      Returns:
      A successful Try containing the ReActorRef for the new reactor on success, a failed Try on failure

    • spawn

      public Try<ReActorRef> spawn​(ReActiveEntity reActiveEntity, ReActiveEntityConfig<?,​?> reActorConfig)
      Create a new reactor
      Parameters:
      reActiveEntity - a reactive entity
      reActorConfig - reactor configuration
      Returns:
      A successful Try containing the ReActorRef for the new reactor on success, a failed Try on failure

    • spawnChild

      public Try<ReActorRef> spawnChild​(ReActions reActions, ReActorRef father, ReActiveEntityConfig<?,​?> reActorConfig)
      Create a new reactor child of the specified reactor
      Parameters:
      reActions - reactor behavior
      reActorConfig - reactor configuration
      father - father of the new reactor
      Returns:
      A successful Try containing the ReActorRef for the new reactor on success, a failed Try on failure

    • spawnService

      public Try<ReActorRef> spawnService​(ReActorServiceConfig reActorServiceConfig)
      Create a new service. Services are reactors automatically backed up by a router
      Parameters:
      reActorServiceConfig - service config
      Returns:
      A successful Try containing the ReActorRef for the new service on success, a failed try on failure

      Parameters:
